titleStmt.title: Certain considerations of present concernment: touching this reformed Church of England. With a particular examination of An: Champny (Doctor of the Sorbon) his exceptions against the lawful calling and ordination of the Protestant bishops and pastors of this Church. / By H: Ferne, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Champney, Anthony. A treatise of the vocation of bishops, and other ecclesiasticall ministers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
